attributes.action: respect this democracy and drop all road pricing and vehicle tracking proposals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public has made its feelings very clear. nearly 1.8 million people petitioned the prime minister to scrap road pricing and vehicle tracking plans. Instead of respecting the opinions of those who elected them, ministers have started a "spin" campaign to pass the road pricing policy they have already decided on. What the public wants is clear. This country needs democracy, not smoke and mirrors

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
